definition: to go forward/to advance/to go in/to enter/to put in/to submit/to take in/to admit/(math.) base of a number system/classifier for sections in a building or residential compound
system/to control/to regulate/variant of 製|制[zhi4]

sentences.english: Converts the specified string representation of a number to an equivalent single-precision floating-point number.
sentences.chinese: 将指定的十进制数的值转换为等效的单精度浮点数。

sentences.english: Decimalization came and went with no major incidents, but that was just the beginning.
sentences.chinese: 十进制的使用并没有引起大的事故，但这只是开始。

sentences.english: Columns 2 through 6 list the relevant material properties in metric units.
sentences.chinese: 列2至6的名单，有关材料性能在十进制单位。

sentences.english: Unless otherwise stated, all numbers in this paper are in decimal system.
sentences.chinese: 除特别指明外，本卷内的所有数均为十进制。

sentences.english: The integer and fraction parts both consist of a sequence of decimal (base ten) digits.
sentences.chinese: 整数和小数部分都由十进制数字序列组成。

sentences.english: A base-10 integer is written as a sequence of digits.
sentences.chinese: 十进制的整数是一个数字序列。

sentences.english: Allows you to customize the decimal format pattern.
sentences.chinese: 允许您定制十进制格式的模式。

sentences.english: It consists of a floating-point literal or decimal integer followed by the lower-case letter i.
sentences.chinese: 它有浮点表和十进制整数跟随小写的字母i。

sentences.english: It contains symbols for decimal separator, percent character, and so forth.
sentences.chinese: 它包含了十进制分隔符，百分比字符等等之类的符号。

sentences.english: Once the position of this pattern is determined, the search looks for a decimal value.
sentences.chinese: 一旦确定了这个模式的位置，搜索便查找十进制值。

sentences.english: Area IDs can be written as a whole number or dotted decimal notation.
sentences.chinese: 区域ID可写成整个数字或写成点十进制记数。

sentences.english: Converts the specified string representation of a number to an equivalent decimal number.
sentences.chinese: 将指定的单精度浮点数的值转换为等效的十进制数。

sentences.english: Of or relating to the decimal number system.
sentences.chinese: 十进制以十为进位的数字系统。

sentences.english: However, they nearly all counted in the same way-in tens.
sentences.chinese: 然而，他们几乎都用相同的方式数数，都是十进制。

sentences.english: Convert the following denary numbers base 8.
sentences.chinese: 把下列各十进制换算成以8为基值的数。

sentences.english: The country decimalized the currency in 1975.
sentences.chinese: 这个国家在1975年把货币改为十进制。

definition: complementary code/binary code with 0 and 1 interchanged
the factorial of a number, e.g. 5! = 5.4.3.2.1 = 120
recurring section of a rational decimal
rules of calculation (addition, subtraction, multiplication and division)/algorithm/fig. to scheme/to calculate (i.e. plot)
